name: 馬金魁
body:
# 基本状况及联系方法
* 姓名：马金魁
* 籍贯：湖南湘潭
* 出生日期：1981年09月25日
* 通信地址：日本秋田市下新城中野字街道端西241-438
* 手机：+81-90-6451-1828
* 邮件：jinkuima@gmail.com
 
# 学习及工作背景
* 秋田县立大学（日本）     食品科学                博士            `2011.03—2014.09`     
  _毕业论文题目：Studies on Frying Stability and Quick Quality Evaluation Method of Local Rapeseed Kizakinonatane Oil_
* 暨南大学                 发育生物学             硕士             `2006.09—2009.07`
  _毕业论文题目：β2肾上腺受体激动剂盐酸克伦特罗对雄性成年大鼠睾丸StAR基因mRNA表达的影响_
* 湖南农业大学             食品科学与工程          学士            `2002.09—2006.07`
* 清远职业技术学院         辅导员兼生理学老师                      `2009.09—2010.12`

# 获奖情况及证书
* 暨南大学               国家公费研究生奖学金                 `2006—2009`
* 湖南农业大学           连续三年校级一等奖学金               `2003—2006`
* 湖南农业大学           连续三年学院“三好学生”               `2003—2006`
* 国家教育部教师资格证书                                
* 国家大学英语六级水平证书
 
# 博士期间参与过的项目
* 食品的物理风味对近红外吸收光谱的作用的研究.                          （2012--2014年度基础研究）
* 干面条在存贮期间品质（风味特性）变化的原因的相关研究   （2013年度(财)饭岛纪念食品科学振兴财团学）
* 面条（干面）的风味评价的相关研究                      （2012-2013年度日本美味技术学会研究基金）
* 稻庭面条的加工特性的研究及其品质提高技术的开发   （2012年度县立大学地方中心研究成果育成事业基金）
* ## 研究助理（RA）的课题:
* 食品素材特性的研究及品质评价技术的开发                                         (2011-2014年）
 
# 论文成果及学术活动
* **Jin-Kui Ma**, Han Zhang, Tomohiro Tsuchiya, Yoshinobu Akiyama, Jie-Yu Chen. “Frying Stability of Rapeseed Kizakinonatane (Brassica napus) Oil in Comparison with Canola Oil”. Food Science and Technology International (Accepted, DOI: 10.1177/1082013213520173，SCI收录)
* **Jinkui MA**, Han ZHANG, Tomohiro TUCHIYA, Yelian MIAO and Jie-Yu CHEN. “Rapid Determination of Degradation of Frying Oil Using Near-Infrared Spectroscopy”. Food Science and Technology Research. (20(2): 217-223, 2014，SCI收录)
* **J.-K. MA**, W.-J. ZHU. “Effects of the β2-agonist clenbuterol on testicular steroidogenic acute regulatory protein mRNA expression in adult rats”. Journal of Veterinary Pharmacology and Therapeutics. (33(6):558-563 (2010), SCI收录).
* **Jin-Kui Ma**, Han Zhang, Kenichi Tsukamoto, Jie-Yu Chen. “Fatty Acid Profile, Bioactive Compounds and Physicochemical Properties of Crude Expeller-Pressed Kizakinonatane (Brassica napus) Oil”. Journal of Food, Agriculture & Environment (Volume 12 (2): 66–69. 2014，SCI收录)
* **Jin-Kui Ma**, Han Zhang, Jie-Yu Chen. Changes in fatty acids and minor components of Kizakinonatane (Brassica napus) Oil in Comparison with Canola Oil during deep frying of French fries. Food Chemistry. (Under review)
* **Jin-Kui Ma**, Han Zhang, Jie-Yu Chen. “Characterization of Kizakinonatane (Brassica napus) Oil and its Frying Stability in Comparison with Commercial Regular Canola Oil”. BIT's 2nd Annual World Congress of Food Science & Technology. P107. Hangzhou, China. 2013/09/23-25. (Oral presentation)
* **Ma Jinkui**, Tuchiya Tomohiro, Zhang Han, Chen Jieyu. “Quality changes of edible oils during deep-fat frying”. The 59th Academic Conference of the Japanese Society for Food Science and Tehnology. Fuji Women's University, Sapporo, Japan. 2012/08/29-31. (Oral presentation)
* Zhang Han, Sasaki KiShun, Nitta YoKei, **Ma Jinkui**, Chen Jieyu. Changes in the processing suitability and pasting property by a mixture of a plurality of starch-based raw materials. The 13th Annual Meeting of Japan Society for Food Engineering. Hokkaido University, Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan. 2012/08/29-31.(EI收录)
* Han Zhang, Syun Sasaki, Yelian Miao, **Jinkui Ma** and Jieyu Chen. “Determination of Raid Viso Analyzer Paremeters in Mixed Cereal Flour Materials by Near Infrared Spectroscopy”. The 3rd Asian Near-Infrared Symposium, Amari Watergate Hotel, Bangkok, Thailand. 2012/05/14-18.
* Jieyu Chen, Yelian Miao, **Jinkui Ma**, Hiroki Inoue and Han Zhang. “Nondestructive Evaluation of the Taste Quality for Apple Fruit Using Near Infrared Spectroscopy”. The 3rd Asian Near-Infrared Symposium, Amari Watergate Hotel, Bangkok, Thailand. 2012/05/14-18.
* Chen Jieyu, Hiroki Inoue, **Ma Jinkui**, Zhang Han. Studies on the flavor and taste evaluation of apple. The 58th Annual Meeting of Japanese Society for Food Science and Technology. Tohoku University/International center, Sendai, Japan 2011/09/09.
